p: Group Two comprised of seven ferrets and 21 tree shrews. Three ferrets and nine tree shrews were inoculated with 1.0 × 10 6 TCID 50 of V0215 or Y12 and one ferret and three tree shrews were intranasally inoculated with equal PBS as negative controls. At 2, 4 and 6 DPI one ferret and three tree shrews inoculated with each virus were killed to collect respiratory tissues for pathology studies and real time PCR. The animals inoculated with PBS were killed at 6 DPI.
